description: Fols. 74; 16 x 11.1 cm.; written surface 12.5-13 x 7.5-8 cm.; 17-20 lines to page; on European paper; in naskhi; with catchwords; entries in red. A treatise on logic. Beg.: بسم الله ... الحمد لله الذي مىز الانسان بالنطق Ending: وقد اورد تعلىما مفىدا في ذلك الانبا لوىس الجسري في کتابه واجبات الکهنوت في الفصل الخامس من المقالة السادسة تمت تم Ruled marginal lines on several folios; with illustrations. MS in good condition; Arabic binding. Acquired from Brill, Leyden, A.D. 1900.
author: Maṭrān, Yuwākīm, d. 1772 or 3.
title: al-Ṣaḥīfah al-ʻabqarīyah fī al-uṣūl al-manṭiqīyah
creator: Maṭrān, Yuwākīm, d. 1772 or 3.
subject: Logic—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
